A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For those who disliked this move it is simple.  Their fan theories did not come true.   That is the only reason why.   The fan base will always complain\, no matter how excellent it is.   This movie delivers.   I have now watched for my 10th time\, and I still love it as much as the others.   \nThis coming from a fan who saw A new hope in the theaters before they called it episode 4
